meanings.definition: Relating to or produced by chromolithography.
meanings.sent1: The chromolithographic poster was colorful and eye-catching.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a chromolithographic image using multiple colors.
meanings.sent3: The party decorations were so chromolithographic that they seemed to jump off the walls.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was a chromolithographic explosion of hues and patterns.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky in a chromolithographic display of reds, oranges, and purples.

meanings.sent1: I bought a beautiful chromolithographic of a scenic landscape.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a collection of chromolithographics from the 19th century.
meanings.sent3: The book cover looked like a chromolithographic of a fairy tale come to life.
meanings.sent4: The old map was a chromolithographic treasure, showcasing intricate details.
meanings.sent5: The shop sold vintage chromolithographics that were highly sought after by collectors.
